title: Will there be more tyre drama at Silverstone?
description: The ESPN F1 crew look ahead to Silverstone's second F1 race in eight days and what Pirelli's response to the British GP drama means for the weekend's action. The team also take a look at your Pit Stop Predictions and we get Nate's Bald Prediction of the 70th Anniversary British Grand Prix race.
itunes:title: Will there be more tyre drama at Silverstone?
itunes:author: ESPN, Alexis Nunes, Laurence Edmondson, Nate Saunders
itunes:subtitle: A look ahead to Silverstone's second F1 race in eight days and what Pirelli's response to the British GP drama means for the weekend's action.
